Seccubus mentioned in HPR315

27 March 2009

![HPR

Logo](http://www.hackerpublicradio.org/images/hprfeedsmall.png)Seccubus (AutoNessus) was mentioned in Hacker Public Radio episode 315

In Hacker Publick Radio Episode 315 Finux interviews Chris John Riley who works as an ethical hacker. At about 10:20 in there is a nice part “Finux: Did you get the episode where Ken Fallon talked about AutoNessus (former name of Seccubus, FB)? Chris: Yes, it was one of the occasions where I stopped the car, phoned my colleagues and said: ‘AutoNessus check it out now’”

AutoNessus 1.3.1 AutoNessus v1.3.0 is out
